## *codiv* ##

<br/>

codiv is an R package that runs codiversification scans between symbionts and their hosts.  <br/>

<br/>

To Install:

```
install.packages("devtools")

library(devtools)

install_github("DanielSprockett/codiv")
```
<br/>

This package is under active development, so please let me know if you run into any issues.
